about_the_game:
Brain Exam with Benefits 2 is a better and much improved version of the first Brain Exam with Benefits. It is a match 3 puzzle sexy game with visual novel elements!



This time you will get to know Mei, a young professional who likes to be dominant during the exams .. but has a very different side in her bedroom! Mei is very strict and won't let you off the hook so easily - you need to impress her by completing serious of match 3 puzzles in order to win her affection.

The gameplay is fun but challenging, with rewards that are worth it. Besides the puzzles, you will also engage in a lot of dialogues and choices, which may influence the game or the sexy poses shown.

After each match you got a big, juicy, beautiful render right from the action between you and Mei. Be prepared for explicit sex scenes!

Features:
- Hyper-polished Match 3 gameplay with attention to detail.
- Visual novel alongside the puzzle
- Choices that influence the gameplay
- High quality CG after each match!
- Failure to progress is also progress.
- Steam achievements
- No empty grind, when you're playing you'll be having fun.
- Explicit sex scenes!

Difficulty:
The puzzles in Brain Exam with Benefits 2 are challenging but with a bit of practice and strategy, you will beat them! They are the perfect level of difficulty for most players.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.

detailed_description:
Brain Exam With Benefits 1


About the Game

Brain Exam with Benefits 2 is a better and much improved version of the first Brain Exam with Benefits. It is a match 3 puzzle sexy game with visual novel elements!



This time you will get to know Mei, a young professional who likes to be dominant during the exams .. but has a very different side in her bedroom! Mei is very strict and won't let you off the hook so easily - you need to impress her by completing serious of match 3 puzzles in order to win her affection.

The gameplay is fun but challenging, with rewards that are worth it. Besides the puzzles, you will also engage in a lot of dialogues and choices, which may influence the game or the sexy poses shown.

After each match you got a big, juicy, beautiful render right from the action between you and Mei. Be prepared for explicit sex scenes!

name: Brain Exam with Benefits 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Brain Exam with Benefits 2 is a lighthearted Match 3 game with Mei, a sexy brain examiner as your teacher. Impress her with your smartness to charm her into submission, or fail pathetically. Be prepared for explicit sex scenes and big, juicy CG after each match!
